description:
Half-Indian and half-English, Rally is a dead shot and an expert (if reckless) driver. She is also extremely proficient when it comes to hand-to-hand combat. Officially the owner, along with May, of her gun shop, Gunsmith Cats, she moonlights as a bounty hunter. She likes pizza.
Her gun of choice is a CZ-75, and her ride is a Shelby Mustang Cobra GT500.
name: Rally Vincent
